text: Identify Scrolls are a helpful tool which can be used to learn more about obtuse
Pick up the Identify Scroll with your cursor in your inventory, then, while still
carrying the scroll, right click on a Spellbook to identify it!
Identifying a Spellbook will provide information on all components it includes,
but $(l)will not$() tell you which component is which.
By default, they are often found in places such as the following:

pages.name: Trading
pages.text: Librarians may give you Identify Scrolls for Emeralds.
